# resultsLimit

**Instance Property**

The maximum number of records that CloudKit retrieves when fetching zone changes.

## Declaration

```swift
var resultsLimit: Int { get set }
```

## Accessing a Zone Change Configuration

- **previousServerChangeToken**: The server change token.
- **desiredKeys**: An array of the record keys to retrieve.

items.description: An array of the record keys to retrieve.
items.name: desiredKeys
